ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
pyLDAvis is designed to help users interpret the topics in a topic
model that has been fit to a corpus of text data. The package extracts
information from a fitted LDA topic model to inform an interactive
web-based visualization.

The visualization is intended to be used within an IPython notebook
but can also be saved to a stand-alone HTML file for easy sharing.
about.summary: Python library for interactive topic model visualization

about.description:
pyLDAvis is designed to help users interpret the topics in a topic
model that has been fit to a corpus of text data. The package extracts
information from a fitted LDA topic model to inform an interactive
web-based visualization.

The visualization is intended to be used within an IPython notebook
but can also be saved to a stand-alone HTML file for easy sharing.
about.summary: Python library for interactive topic model visualization

name: pyldavis
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pyLDAvis" %}
{% set version = "3.4.1" %}
{% set sha256 = "501775a4a7b7482e9033c924ef0e84eab3f657efce5c9fdb2ac85b77b60c91bb" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 1
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - numpy >=1.14.0
    - scipy >=0.18.0
    - pandas >=1.3.4
    - joblib >=1.2.0
    - jinja2
    - numexpr
    - future
    - funcy
    - scikit-learn >=1.0.0
    - gensim
    - setuptools
    # Required for gensim
    - fuzzytm

test:
  imports:
    - pyLDAvis
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/bmabey/pyLDAvis
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Python library for interactive topic model visualization

  description: |
    pyLDAvis is designed to help users interpret the topics in a topic 
    model that has been fit to a corpus of text data. The package extracts
    information from a fitted LDA topic model to inform an interactive 
    web-based visualization.

    The visualization is intended to be used within an IPython notebook
    but can also be saved to a stand-alone HTML file for easy sharing.
  doc_url: http://pyldavis.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/bmabey/pyLDAvis

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - sodre
    - CurtLH
    - thewchan
